html: "Then they opened fire on Hampton’s bedroom. Despite the intense round of fire, Hampton and his pregnant fiancee were only wounded. Upon that discovery, an officer shot him twice in his head and killed him" http://bit.ly/2wzWuCD pic.twitter.com/FvKubawyfG
text: "Then they opened fire on Hampton’s bedroom. Despite the intense round of fire, Hampton and his pregnant fiancee were only wounded. Upon that discovery, an officer shot him twice in his head and killed him" http://bit.ly/2wzWuCD pic.twitter.com/FvKubawyfG

html: "We’ve got to face the fact that some people say you fight fire best with fire, but we say you put fire out best with water. We say you don’t fight racism with racism. We’re going to fight racism with solidarity" Fred Hamptonpic.twitter.com/Hx18ui0evt
text: "We’ve got to face the fact that some people say you fight fire best with fire, but we say you put fire out best with water. We say you don’t fight racism with racism. We’re going to fight racism with solidarity" Fred Hamptonpic.twitter.com/Hx18ui0evt

html: It has come to my attention that an interview I conducted for a documentary is being repurposed and used as a promotional tool by a Chicago mayoral candidate. I want to be perfectly clear that in NO WAY, shape or form am I endorsing any Chicago mayoral candidates at this time.
